items.name: Beef Burger
items.description: A patty of ground beef grilled and placed between two halves of a bun.

items.name: Chicken Burger
items.description: A sandwich made with a cooked chicken patty, typically served on a bun with various toppings and condiments.

items.name: Fish Burger
items.description: Our flaky and delicious fish filet burger served on a toasted bun with tartar sauce and shredded lettuce.

items.name: Chicken Nuggets
items.description: Bite-sized pieces of tender, all-white meat chicken, seasoned to perfection and served with your choice of dipping sauce.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Golden, crispy, and irresistibly delicious, our fries are the perfect addition to any meal.

items.name: Soft Drink
items.description: Choose from a variety of refreshing beverages to quench your thirst.

items.name: Onion Rings
items.description: Crispy breaded rings of sweet onion, fried to perfection and served hot.

items.name: Mozzarella Sticks
items.description: Golden-fried and filled with melted mozzarella cheese, our crispy mozzarella sticks are perfect for dipping!

items.name: Milkshake
items.description: Thick and creamy hand-spun milkshake in your choice of flavor - chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry.

items.name: Iced Tea
items.description: Refreshing iced tea available in sweetened or unsweetened flavors.
